attributes.action: Return ALL foreign nationals convicted of a criminal offence to their country of origin
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All foreign nationals, regardless of race, creed or colour, who have been convicted of any criminal offence in the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland should be returned to the country of their birth immediately, along with ALL their dependents. This would not only reduce the prison population of our country, but would also reduce the Government outlay on Benefits, and subsequently our tax bills. On deportation, a biometric and DNA record should be taken to prevent them returning.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
